entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: 7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 3 with temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 15.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
